Private Patient Scans On-demandGet the scans you need, when you need them, at a price that suits.We offer fast, high quality, reliable scans, with dedicated appointment slots everyday, and reports back in 24-48 hours.From self-pay CT and MRI to PET-CT and private medical insurance pathways - our expert radiologists are always on hand as a designated point of contact.CONTACT USEmail us at: info@lodestonepatientcare.com
THE RACE TO REDUCE PRESSURE
01Overstretched services
A rising need for diagnostic services, longer waiting lists and few healthcare providers close to patients' homes - has stretched us beyond capacity.
02Under-resourced workforce
The driving force behind all health-care services, an incredible team of people who deliver high quality care and support daily - now they themselves need more support.
03Growing demaind for diagnostics
Our ageing population, covid delays and an increased awareness of diagnostics means a rapidly growing demand on our already stretched services.
